story: Seria is the 101st heir of the ShadowHilts, a family of hunters that slays non-human, supernatural beings. She came all the way to Orvelia as a vampire hunter, seeking vengeance against her sister who turned into a vampire and slaughtered her comrades. Seria is also trying to save her little sister by putting her out of her misery.
trivia: Seria is a 19 year old girl.
Her birthday is July 6, month of Harmony.
Her constellation is Notmun the Turner.
She likes her sister Erze, strawberry parfait, fine swords and the moon.
She dislikes her sister as a vampire and spiders.
She is the second hero to have a playable sibling (after Laias and Lilia).
Aside from hunting down her sister due to the murder of her friends, Seria had also been searching for Lewisia.
Her weapon more closely resembles a Katana.
Likely the chosen warrior in her story is Kyle, who seems to have fallen into path of darkness.
